## \_getWeekRange() function

Get a date range containing the start and end date of a specified week.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getWeekRange(date?: Immutable<Date>, getISO?: boolean): Immutable<DateRange>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Immutable&lt;Date&gt; | A date with the desired week |
|  getISO | boolean | Set to true if you want the output as ISO strings |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;[DateRange](./date-time-helpers.daterange.md)<!-- -->&gt;
